author: jonaye
title: Space Hovercraft
review:
I remember this set way back in the day. One of my firsts- I didn't get into castles or pirates so much back then. Space was the way to go!

This set is pretty sweet overall. Great "swooshability" and removable side things (we'll call them satellites) and a canopy that locks into place.

I remember hours of playing with this set, wrecking it (for it is fairly fragile) and rebuilding it.

Pros

  • Plenty of moving parts
  • Detachable satellites on sides, which can link together
  • Few if any "proprietary" pieces, of course this is true with most classic sets

Cons

  • Relatively fragile, weak links on the canopy, would disassemble itself quite easily
  • Could have been bigger, but it was perfect when I was only 5


Now that I'm back to building with Lego again I think I'll revive all these old sets in my collection that have been dormant for 20 years.
